alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 24 at 8:44AM PST until February 25 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM PST SATURDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...The current Freeze Warning will expire as temperatures warm above freezing this morning. Another round of freezing temperatures are expected tonight with sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23 expected. * WHERE...South Central Oregon Coast and Curry County Coast. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast
